title: Chicken roulades with spinach and mushrooms
ingredients: ['2 tbsp olive oil', '1 large portobello mushroom, coarsely chopped', '4 spring onions, sliced', '250g fresh young spinach, coarsely chopped', '2 tbsp dry breadcrumbs (made from stale bread)', '2 tbsp freshly grated Parmesan', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts or thighs, about 175g each', '125ml chicken stock, hot', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper']
